content:
Hi, is there a chance somebody could review a tiny PR https://github.com/bytecodealliance/WASI-Virt/pull/127 for fixing command line arguments that was recently broken?

Add back --help flag and cli suggestions by ludfjig 路 Pull Request #127 路 bytecodealliance/WASI-Virt
#121 broke --help and automatic suggestions by removing clap default features, making the binary very hard to use for new users (me). This PR adds back the clap default features so that --help and ...
